document.full_text: russian prime minister vladimir putin cultivates the image of a bare-chested macho man, but a nun-like sect in central russia thinks actually he's the reincarnation of st. paul, the apostle.
document.title: putin is saint and saviour for russian cult
lines_and_colors: russian prime minister vladimir putin cultivates the image of a bare-chested macho man, but a nun-like sect in central russia thinks actually he's the reincarnation of st. paul, the apostle.
